name: sonarqube-mcp
description: SonarQube FastAPI MCP Server for Qwen, Cursor, and Claude

page_size.description: Number of projects per page (default: 100, max: 500)

commands.name: get_coverage_metrics
commands.description: Get all coverage metrics for a SonarQube component

commands.name: get_overall_coverage
commands.description: Get overall coverage for a SonarQube component

commands.name: get_new_code_coverage
commands.description: Get new code coverage for a SonarQube component

commands.name: get_duplication_rate
commands.description: Get duplication rate for a SonarQube component

commands.name: get_uncovered_lines
commands.description: Get uncovered lines for a SonarQube component

commands.name: get_project_issues
commands.description: Get issues for a SonarQube component

types.description: Issue types to filter (CODE_SMELL, BUG, VULNERABILITY, SECURITY_HOTSPOT)

severities.description: Severities to filter (INFO, MINOR, MAJOR, CRITICAL, BLOCKER)

statuses.description: Statuses to filter (OPEN, CONFIRMED, REOPENED, RESOLVED, CLOSED)

commands.name: health_check
commands.description: Check if the SonarQube MCP server is healthy
